languages.text: Исследование в таких экстремальных условиях — дело нелегкое. В расчеты техножрецов вкрадывается ошибка, машины не выдерживают температур и гибнут, необратимо повреждая странные постройки. Однако это еще не конец — впереди ждут иные пылающие миры, где можно продолжить работу.

traits.locale_text: Исследование в таких экстримальных условиях — дело нелегкое. В расчеты техножрецов вкрадывается ошибка, техника не выдерживает температур и взрывается, необратимо повреждая странные постройки. Оданко это еще не конец — впереди ждут иные пылающие миры, где можно продолжить работу.

languages.text: Exploring under extreme conditions is never easy. A mistake in the Tech-Priests' calculations causes the machines to succumb to severe heat stress and malfunction, damaging the strange constructions beyond repair. This is not the end, however, as there are more burning worlds where this research can be carried out after the necessary modifications are made.
languages.original_text: Исследование в таких экстремальных условиях — дело нелегкое. В расчеты техножрецов вкрадывается ошибка, машины не выдерживают температур и гибнут, необратимо повреждая странные постройки. Однако это еще не конец — впереди ждут иные пылающие миры, где можно продолжить работу.

traits.locale_text: Exploring under extreme conditions is never easy. A mistake in the calculations made by Tech-Priests leads to the machines succumbing to heat and malfunctioning, damaging the strange constructions beyond repair. This is not the end, however, as there are more burning worlds where the research can be carried out after the necessary corrections are made.

This is not the end, however, as there are more burning worlds where the research can be carried out after the necessary corrections are made.

A mistake in the Tech-Priests' calculations causes the machines to succumb to severe heat stress and malfunction, damaging the strange constructions beyond repair. This is not the end, however, as there are more burning worlds where this research can be carried out after the necessary modifications are made.

A mistake in the Tech-Priests' calculations causes the machines to succumb to severe heat stress and malfunction, damaging the strange constructions beyond repair. This is not the end, however, as there are more burning worlds where this research can be carried out after the necessary modifications are made.

Exploring under extreme conditions is never easy. A mistake in the Tech-Priests' calculations causes the machines to succumb to severe heat stress and malfunction, damaging the strange constructions beyond repair. This is not the end, however, as there are more burning worlds where this research can be carried out after the necessary modifications are made.

languages.text: 在极端条件下进行探索，从来都不是什么容易的事情。技术神甫的计算发生了错误，导致这些机器遭受了严重的热过载，发生故障。那些奇特的建筑也因此遭受了无法修复的损坏。不过这并不意味着这场研究到此为止，只要进行了必要的矫正之后，还有更多的燃烧世界可供继续研究。
languages.original_text: Exploring under extreme conditions is never easy. A mistake in the Tech-Priests' calculations causes the machines to succumb to severe heat stress and malfunction, damaging the strange constructions beyond repair. This is not the end, however, as there are more burning worlds where this research can be carried out after the necessary modifications are made.

traits.locale_text: 在极端条件下进行探索，从来都不是什么容易的事情。技术祭司的计算发生了错误，导致这些机器遭受了严重的热过载，发生故障。那些奇特的建筑也因此遭受了无法修复的损坏。不过这并不意味着这场研究到此为止，只要进行了必要的矫正之后，还有更多的燃烧世界可供继续研究。

languages.text: 過酷な状況下での探検は決して容易ではない。 技術司祭の計算ミスにより、機械が深刻な熱応力に見舞われて故障し、奇妙な建造物は修復不可能なほど損傷した。とはいえ、これで終わりではなく、必要な修正を施した上で、この研究を実施できるバーニングワールドはまだまだある。
languages.original_text: Exploring under extreme conditions is never easy. A mistake in the Tech-Priests' calculations causes the machines to succumb to severe heat stress and malfunction, damaging the strange constructions beyond repair. This is not the end, however, as there are more burning worlds where this research can be carried out after the necessary modifications are made.

traits.locale_text: 過酷な状況下での探検は決して容易ではない。 技術司祭の計算ミスにより、機械が深刻な熱応力に見舞われて故障し、奇妙な建造物は修復不可能なほど損傷した。とはいえ、これで終わりではなく、必要な修正を施した上で、この研究を実施できるバーニングワールドはまだまだある。

languages.text: Explorar en condiciones extremas nunca es fácil. Un error en los cálculos de los tecnosacerdotes hace que las máquinas sucumban a un fuerte estrés térmico y funcionen mal, dañando las extrañas construcciones más allá de toda reparación. Sin embargo, este no es el final, ya que hay más mundos ardientes donde se puede llevar a cabo esta investigación una vez realizadas las modificaciones necesarias.
languages.original_text: Exploring under extreme conditions is never easy. A mistake in the Tech-Priests' calculations causes the machines to succumb to severe heat stress and malfunction, damaging the strange constructions beyond repair. This is not the end, however, as there are more burning worlds where this research can be carried out after the necessary modifications are made.

traits.locale_text: Explorar en condiciones extremas nunca es fácil. Un error en los cálculos de los tecnosacerdotes hace que las máquinas sucumban a un fuerte estrés térmico y funcionen mal, dañando las extrañas construcciones más allá de toda reparación. Sin embargo, este no es el final, ya que hay más mundos {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardientes{/g} donde se puede llevar a cabo esta investigación una vez realizadas las modificaciones necesarias.

languages.text: Fremde Welten unter extremen Bedingungen zu erkunden, ist niemals leicht. Ein Fehler in den Berechnungen der Techpriester sorgt dafür, dass die Maschinen gewaltiger Hitze und großem Stress ausgesetzt werden. Es kommt zu Fehlfunktionen, durch die die merkwürdigen Gebilde unwiederbringlich beschädigt werden. Aber das ist nicht das Ende, denn es gibt noch weitere brennende Welten, auf denen diese Forschungen mit einigen kleinen Modifikationen fortgeführt werden können.
languages.original_text: Exploring under extreme conditions is never easy. A mistake in the Tech-Priests' calculations causes the machines to succumb to severe heat stress and malfunction, damaging the strange constructions beyond repair. This is not the end, however, as there are more burning worlds where this research can be carried out after the necessary modifications are made.

traits.locale_text: Fremde Welten unter extremen Bedingungen zu erkunden, ist niemals leicht. Ein Fehler in den Berechnungen der Techpriester sorgt dafür, dass die Maschinen gewaltiger Hitze und großem Stress ausgesetzt werden. Es kommt zu Fehlfunktionen, durch die die merkwürdigen Gebilde unwiederbringlich beschädigt werden. Aber das ist nicht das Ende, denn es gibt noch weitere brennende Welten, auf denen diese Forschungen mit einigen kleinen Modifikationen fortgeführt werden können.

languages.text: L'exploration en milieu extrême n'est jamais chose aisée. Une erreur dans les calculs des technoprêtres scelle le sort des machines qui explosent des suites d'une surchauffe critique, endommageant irrémédiablement les étranges constructions. Néanmoins, tout n'est pas perdu pour autant, car il reste encore bien d'autres mondes brûlants où poursuivre les recherches après avoir procédé aux modifications nécessaires.
languages.original_text: Exploring under extreme conditions is never easy. A mistake in the Tech-Priests' calculations causes the machines to succumb to severe heat stress and malfunction, damaging the strange constructions beyond repair. This is not the end, however, as there are more burning worlds where this research can be carried out after the necessary modifications are made.

languages.text: Ekstrem şartlar altında keşif yapmak asla kolay olmaz. Tekno Rahiplerin hesaplarında yapılan bir hata yüzünden makineler ağır ısı stresine yenik düşüp arıza yapınca tuhaf yapılara tamir edilemeyecek bir derecede hasar veriyor. Yine de her şeyin sonuna gelinmiş değil çünkü gerekli değişiklikler yapıldıktan sonra bu araştırmanın gerçekleştirilebileceği başka yanan dünyalar da var.
languages.original_text: Exploring under extreme conditions is never easy. This is not the end, however, as there are more burning worlds where this research can be carried out after the necessary modifications are made.
